    • Connect to Postgres

    • Run Docker with pgAdmin 4 container
      • Open port 5050

Docker: PostgreSQL 10 and pgAdmin 4

Run Docker with PostgreSQL container

:smile: Make persistent volume to store config files and database files: d

item.title: Firebase
item.description: Adding Firebase Authentication to Shiny Firebase and Shiny Benefits over building a custom solution in R Example using Firebase Authentication with Shiny Adding Firebase Authentication to Shiny Firebase and Shiny Firebase is a mobile and web application development platform owned by Google. Firebase provides front-end solutions for authentication, database storage, object storage, messaging, and more. Firebase drastically reduces the time needed to develop certain types of highly scalable and secure applications.
